WorkItem.Description:
Following the instructions on the discussions page, I downloaded what the mono page links to as their version 2.2
and Rawr brings up the splash screen and fails with
 
Unknown target convertion type from System.Boolean to System.Windows.Forms.CheckState
at System.Convert.ToType(System.Object value, System.Type conversionType, IFormatProvider provide) [0x00000]
at ... some more converts and Forms.Bindings
at System.Windows.Forms.binding.PushData(Boolean force) [0x00000]
 
Note that the please email cnervig error message that says to copy (CTRL-C) is not enabled for copy with the command/copy key
or CTRL-C under OSx (so maybe changing the your error handler to dump to console as well would be good.)
 
mono -V
Mono JIT compiler version 2.2 (tarball Fri Jan  9 10:45:07 MST 2009)
Copyright (C) 2002-2008 Novell, Inc and Contributors. www.mono-project.com
	TLS:           normal
	GC:            Included Boehm (with typed GC)
	SIGSEGV:       normal
	Notification:  Thread + polling
	Architecture:  x86

I had Rawr working for a while, tried to update to the 2.2.15 and it failed, saw that you had
similar issues and thought it might get fixed.  It hasn't, so I'm opening an issue.  Let me know
if I can provide more information.
